src_original: atra bhagavatāpi - “asmin satīdaṃ bhavati” iti kāryakaraṇabhāvasya nirdeśāt kalpanātrayaṃ vivarjya caturthī svīkriyate /
tāḥ kalpanāḥ punaḥ - kāraṇat pūrvaṃ kāryaṃ vā,  samakālike kāryakāraṇe vā,
avyavahitatve sati dvitīyakṣaṇe 'vasthānaṃ vā - ityevaṃvidhāḥ syuḥ /
tatra yattavat pūrvameva sthitaṃ bhavati na tad hetau sati jāyate,

tadā kathaṃ talloke pratītaṃ syāt /  yadi nityaditaraṃ kimapyanityamiti nigadyeta?  tadā nityasya vikalpātmakatvāttat [itaraṃ] tāvat sāmarthyānnirvikalpaṃ jñānamityatasyadavasthāyāṃ  'saṃvṛtisat' - iti kathanaṃ tu nirvikalpakajñānena tatpratīyata ityabhihitaṃ syāt /
[tathātve ca] anumānakalpanāyā api tāvat parihāraḥ syāt savikalpakatvāttasyāḥ /
prākṛtakairapratītatvāt /  [66] atha māyārthaḥ saṃvṛtyartha iti cet tadā ko hi nāma māyārtha iti vaktavyam /  yadi sarvamasaditi,
